trans-unit.source: Add django.contrib.sitemaps to installed apps
trans-unit.target: 将 django.contrib.sitemaps 添加到已安装的应用程序

trans-unit.source: Add sitemap_generate application to installed apps in django settings:
trans-unit.target: 在Django设置 sitemap_generate 应用程序添加到已安装的应用程序中：

trans-unit.source: Add a reference to sitemap mapping to django settings:
trans-unit.target: 在django设置中添加站点地图映射的引用。

trans-unit.source: Almost every content site has a sitemap. Django provides an application serving sitemap views, and it's OK if your website is small. If you have complicate logic in sitemap generation or if you have millions of items in sitemap - you'll have a massive load spikes when Google and another search engines come with thousands of there indexer bots. These bots will request same sitemap pages in parallel and those requests couldn't be cached because of large index interval and small hit rate.
trans-unit.target: 几乎每个内容网站都有一个网站地图。Django提供了一个服务于sitemap视图的应用,如果你的网站很小,那是可以的。如果你的网站地图生成的逻辑很复杂,或者你的网站地图中有几百万个项目--当Google和其他搜索引擎的成千上万的索引机器人来的时候,你会有一个巨大的负载高峰。这些机器人会同时请求相同的sitemap页面,由于索引间隔大,点击率小,这些请求无法被缓存。

trans-unit.source: Also you may need to setup forwarded protocol handling in django settings:
trans-unit.target: 另外你可能需要在django设置中设置转发协议处理。

trans-unit.source: And you will need to configure xml files static responses, i.e. in nginx:
trans-unit.target: 而且你需要配置xml文件静态响应,即在nginx中。

trans-unit.source: Background sitemap generation for Django
trans-unit.target: 为Django生成后台网站地图

trans-unit.source: Background sitemap generation for Django.
trans-unit.target: 为Django生成后台网站地图。

trans-unit.source: Configure at least one sitemap
trans-unit.target: 配置至少一个网站地图

trans-unit.source: Configure sitemap serving
trans-unit.target: 配置网站地图服务

trans-unit.source: Django Sitemap Generate
trans-unit.target: 生成Django网站地图

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Note that changefreq parameter is a hint for search engine indexer, it does not affect sitemap files generation period.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， changefreq 参数是搜索引擎索引器的提示，它不会影响站点地图文件的生成时间。

trans-unit.source: Note that django paginates sitemap with p query parameter, but corresponding sitemap files are named sitemap-video.xml, sitemap-video-2.xml and so on. You'll need to configure some "rewrites".
trans-unit.target: 请注意，django使用 p 查询参数对站点地图进行分页，但相应的站点地图文件名为 sitemap-video.xml ， sitemap-video-2.xml 等。您需要配置一些“重写”。

trans-unit.source: Now your website supports sitemap views.
trans-unit.target: 现在你的网站支持网站地图浏览。

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: 先决条件

trans-unit.source: The solution is to re-generate sitemap files periodically, once per day and not once per search engine indexer. These files could be served as static files which will not affect backend performance at all.
trans-unit.target: 解决方法是定期重新生成网站地图文件,每天一次,而不是每个搜索引擎索引器一次。这些文件可以作为静态文件,完全不会影响后端性能。

trans-unit.source: These project uses index sitemap view and per-model sitemap views to generate sitemap xml files. To provide it you will need following.
trans-unit.target: 该项目使用index sitemap视图和per-model sitemap视图来生成sitemap xml文件。要提供它,你将需要以下内容。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: Use case
trans-unit.target: 使用案例

trans-unit.source: When you request sitemap over http, django substitutes website domain name from request to links in sitemap xml. In background, you'll need some environment variables. By defaults link are generated for localhost over HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 当您通过http请求站点地图时，django将网站域名从请求替换为站点地图xml中的链接。在后台，您将需要一些环境变量。默认情况下，通过HTTPS为 localhost 生成链接。

trans-unit.source: Working example is in testproject.testapp.
trans-unit.target: 工作示例在 testproject.testapp 中。

trans-unit.source: You may need to override default sitemap index url name
trans-unit.target: 您可能需要覆盖默认的sitemap索引网址名称。

trans-unit.source: You may run sitemap generation from celery:
trans-unit.target: 你可以从芹菜中运行网站地图生成。

trans-unit.source: You may run sitemap generation from crontab:
trans-unit.target: 您可以从crontab运行网站地图生成。
